alignment.markdownDescription: Represents the alignment of status bar items.

name.markdownDescription: The name of the status bar item (Shown in context menu).

text.markdownDescription: Text of the status bar item.

priority.markdownDescription: The priority of the item. Higher values mean the item should be shown more to the left.

hidden.markdownDescription: Do not show this Status Bar Item.

activeEditorGlob.markdownDescription: Only show when active editor file matches [glob](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#GlobPattern) pattern.

activeEditorLanguage.markdownDescription: Only show when active editor [Language Id](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/languages/identifiers) matches.

tooltip.markdownDescription: Show when hovering over status bar item.

markdownTooltip.markdownDescription: Show when hovering over status bar item (markdown). https://github.com/usernamehw/vscode-commands/issues/16

color.markdownDescription: Color of the text in status bar.

backgroundColor.markdownDescription: Background of Status bar item (only `error` & `warning` values are allowed).

commandObject.markdownDescription: Title of your custom command. Needs to be unique.

when.markdownDescription: a `when` expression of when the command will be avaliable at the command palette. See [VSCode API](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/when-clause-contexts).

repeat.markdownDescription: Run this command or sequence this number of times.

markdownTooltip.markdownDescription: Add custom markdown text to hover tooltip.

disableTooltip.markdownDescription: Do not show the hover tooltip for this Tree View Item.

iconColor.markdownDescription: Use existing colors for icon [Color id list](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/theme-color)

nestedItems.markdownDescription: Makes this item a folder. Nested items render inside it.

hidden.markdownDescription: Do not show this in the Tree View.
